mapper.select: select c.chart_id, c.song_id, s.song_title_cn, s.song_title_en, s.song_title_jp, c.difficulty_id, d.difficulty_name, c.chart_level, c.chart_usable from mug_chart c left join mug_song s on c.song_id = s.song_id left join mug_difficulty d on c.difficulty_id = d.difficulty_id where s.song_id = #{songId} order by d.inx
